Summary: Card with incorrect number is accepted
Description:
**Description:**

Card with incorrect number is accepted.



**Pre-conditions:**

An item added to the shopping cart. 4 steps of checkout are completed. Credit card payment method is selected.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open the payment information link on <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/onepagecheckout>

2. Fill the card data with invalid card number (other fields filled correctly):

   <https://docs.assist.ru/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=5767473>

3. Click the continue button.

4. "Wrong card number" message is displayed.

5. Change the card number to another invalid number

**Expected result:**

"Wrong card number" message is displayed.



**Actual result:**

Redirected to the confirm order page.

Summary: Improvement: add validations
Description:
**Discuss with PM to add validations for the following fields (checkout):**

E-mail

First name

Last name

Company

Address

Zip / postal code

Fax number

Cardholder name

Card code

PO number

Summary: Cards with insufficient funds, stolen cards, transaction not permitted cards are accepted
Description:
**Description:**

Cards with insufficient funds, stolen cards, transaction not permitted cards are accepted.



**Pre-conditions:**

An item added to the shopping cart. 4 steps of checkout are completed. Credit card payment method is selected.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open the payment information link on <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/onepagecheckout>
2. Fill the card data with insufficient funds/ stolen cards/transaction not permitted cards info from the list:

   <https://docs.assist.ru/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=5767473>
3. Click the continue button.



**Expected result:**

Error message is displayed, card isn't accepted.



**Actual result:**

Redirected to the confirm order page.

Summary: Test credit card with invalid cardholder's name is accepted
Description:
**Description:**

Test credit card with invalid cardholder's name is accepted.



**Pre-conditions:**

An item added to the shopping cart. 4 steps of checkout are completed. Credit card payment method is selected.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open the payment information link on <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/onepagecheckout>
2. Fill the name field with a random text
3. Fill the other fields with valid test cards data <https://docs.assist.ru/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=5767473>
4. Click the continue button.

**Expected result:**

"Wrong cardholder name" message is displayed.



**Actual result:**

Redirected to the confirm order page.

Summary: Checkout as guest: First state from the dropdown is selected automatically after selecting US/Canada
Description:
**Description:**

Checkout as guest: first state from the dropdown is selected automatically after selecting US/Canada.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open the checkout page <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/onepagecheckout>
2. Select the country with states: US or Canada

   

**Expected result:**

State/province field doesn't change.

**Actual result:**

State/province field is automatically filled with the first state from the dropdown.

Summary: Password recovery: E-mail with instructions isn't delivered
Description:
**Description:**

E-mail with instructions isn't delivered while trying to recover a password.



**Pre-conditions:**

The user is already registered.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open the login page <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/login>
2. Click the "Forgot password" link.
3. Fill the e-mail field.
4. Click the recover button.

   

**Expected result:**

Email with instructions is delivered to the specified e-mail.



**Actual result:**

Email with instructions isn't delivered to the specified e-mail.

Summary: Estimate shipping: Shipping price isn't estimated with any input values
Description:
**Description:**

Shipping price isn't estimated with any input values (both valid and invalid zip-codes).



**Pre-conditions:**

An item added to the shopping cart.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/cart>
2. Select country, state, zip-code.
3. Click the Estimate shipping button without selecting a country.

**Expected result:**

Shipping price is estimated.



**Actual result:**

Shipping price is esimated with zero values.

Summary: Estimate shipping: No error message is displayed after clicking the Estimate shipping button without selecting a country
Description:
**Description:**

No error message is displayed after clicking the Estimate shipping button without selecting a country.



**Pre-conditions:**

An item added to the shopping cart.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/cart>
2. Click the Estimate shipping button without selecting a country.

   

**Expected result:**

"Please select a country to estimate shipping" message is displayed.



**Actual result:**

Shipping price is esimated with zero values.

Summary: "The coupon code you entered couldn't be applied to your order" message is displayed for an emty/invalid gift card code
Description:
**Description:**

"The **coupon code** you entered couldn't be applied to your order" message is displayed for an emty/invalid gift card code



**Pre-conditions:**

An item added to the shopping cart.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open the shopping cart**.**
2. Fill the gift card field with invalid code or leave it empty.
3. Click the "Add gift card" button.



**Expected result:**

"The **gift card number** you entered couldn't be applied to your order" message is displayed.



**Actual result:**

"The coupon code you entered couldn't be applied to your order" message is displayed.

Summary: Item card: total price doesn't change after configuring item's parameters
Description:
**Description:**

Total price doesn't change after configuring item's parameters (for items with configurable parameters).



**Pre-conditions:**

\-



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open the card of an item with configurable parameters (**[Build your own cheap computer](https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/build-your-cheap-own-computer)).**
2. Change the parameters.



**Expected result:**

The price is updated according to configuration.



**Actual result:**

The price doesn't change.

**Steps to reproduce:**

2. Open devtools.

Summary: Payment information: error messages remains after returning back from "confirm order page"
Description:
**Description:**

Cards with insufficient funds, stolen cards, transaction not permitted cards are accepted.



**Pre-conditions:**

An item added to the shopping cart. 4 steps of checkout are completed. Credit card payment method is selected.



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Open the payment information link on <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/onepagecheckout>

2. Fill the card data with invalid data.

3. Click the continue button.

4. Error messages are displayed.

5. Change the card info to the valid <https://docs.assist.ru/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=5767473>

6. Click the continue button. 

7. Confirm order page opens.

8. Click the back button.

   

**Expected result:**

No error messages displayed after returning to the payment information page.



**Actual result:**

Error messages remains.

Summary: Test credit card with invalid expiration date is accepted
Description:
**Description:**

Test credit card with invalid (past) expiration date name is accepted.



**Pre-conditions:**

An item added to the shopping cart. 4 steps of checkout are completed. Credit card payment method is selected.

Redirected to the confirm order page.

Summary: Add customer. Mobile number: limited length
Testing documentation: Anna Takhtamysheva

Open <https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php>



**Steps to reproduce:**

\-

**Expected result:**

The address field placeholder is "Address"



**Actual result:**

The address field placeholder is "Enter your address"

Open <https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php>

\-

Summary: Add customer. Mobile number: incorrect error message for empty field
Description:
**Description:**

Incorrect error message appears after leaving the mobile number field empty.



**Pre-conditions:**

Open <https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php>



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Click the mobile number field and leave it empty

**Expected result:**

"Mobile must not be blank" message occurs.



**Actual result:**

"Mobile no must not be blank" message occurs.

Summary: Add customer. Mobile number: incorrect error message for characters and special characters (together)
Description:
**Description:**

"Special characters are not allowed" error message appears after filling the mobile number field with characters and special characters together.



**Pre-conditions:**

Open <https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php>



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Fill in the mobile number field with characters and special characters: qqq!!!

**Expected result:**

"Characters and special characters are not allowed" message occurs.



**Actual result:**

"Special characters are not allowed" message occurs.

Summary: Add customer. Mobile number: incorrect error message for special characters (dot at the end)
Description:
**Description:**

No error message appears after filling the mobile field with numbers adding dot sign at the end.



**Pre-conditions:**

Open <https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php>



**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Fill in mobile field with numbers, add dot sign at the end: 9999999999.

**Expected result:**

"Special characters are not allowed" message occurs.



**Actual result:**

No error message occurs.

Summary: Add customer. Email: no error message for cyrillic and special characters

**Description:**

**Steps to reproduce:**

1. Fill the email field with cyrillic and special characters with @ and domain zone: почта!@gmail.com

**Expected result:**

"Email-ID must not be blank" message occurs.



**Actual result:**

No message occurs.

Summary: Add customer. Reset button: error message doesn't disappear after clicking the reset button
Description:
